CHAT.comment: Child teaches mother how to take a small figure , make her jump up and down 3 times and sit on a minature park bench.
Child teaches mother to take a figure and make it jump over the little figure , run around the larger figure and sit on the minature park bench.

u.a: mother has had her eyes closed while child learned the new task
